Detailed Description

Base tree item class.

Adds a new child node.

Parameters:
child child to add.
id an optional ID for the new item.

Returns:
the newly added item.

virtual void CStatTreeItemBase::AddECValues ( CECTag *   )  const [inline, protected, virtual]

Add values to the EC tag being generated.

Should have a real implementation in children which have some value. The given parameter is the tag to which values should be added.

Reimplemented in CStatTreeItemRateCounter, CStatTreeItemPeakConnections, CStatTreeItemSimple, CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl< _Tp >, CStatTreeItemHiddenCounter, CStatTreeItemUlDlCounter, CStatTreeItemCounterMax, CStatTreeItemPackets, CStatTreeItemPacketTotals, CStatTreeItemTimer, CStatTreeItemAverage, CStatTreeItemAverageSpeed, CStatTreeItemRatio, CStatTreeItemReconnects, CStatTreeItemMaxConnLimitReached, CStatTreeItemTotalClients, CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl< uint32_t >, and CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl< uint64_t >.

Referenced by CreateECTag().

CECTag * CStatTreeItemBase::CreateECTag ( uint32_t  max_children  )  [virtual]

Create an EC tag from this node (and children).

Parameters:
max_children The maximum number of children to show, when the stCapChildren flag is set. Otherwise it has no effect. (0 = unlimited)
Returns:
A EC tag containing this node and all its children.

References AddECValues(), CECTag::AddTag(), IsVisible(), m_children, m_flags, m_label, m_lock, m_uniqueid, m_visible_counter, and stCapChildren.

StatTreeItemIterator CStatTreeItemBase::GetFirstVisibleChild ( uint32_t  max_children  ) 

Get the first visible child.

Parameters:

wxMutex& CStatTreeItemBase::GetLock (  )  [inline]

Returns the mutex used to lock the child list of this node.

This function is used by CStatisticsDlg to be able to lock the core tree while updating the GUI tree.

References m_lock.
